bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEMS, METHODS, AND APPARATUS FOR ENHANCING AND UTILIZING OWED-VALUE ACCOUNTS

nplcit.text: PRODUCT FOCUS - PREPAID CARDS: From niche to mainstream. (2006). Cards International, , 10-13. Retrieved from http://search.proquest.com/docview/198842138?accountid=14753
Dernovsek, D. (2007). Prepaid cards bridge the gap. Credit Union Magazine, 73(2), 44-48. Retrieved from http://search.proquest.com/docview/236052275?accountid=14753
Horne, D. R. (2007). Gift cards: Disclosure one step removed. The Journal of Consumer Affairs, 41(2), 341-350. Retrieved from http://search.proquest.com/docview/195910896?accountid=14753

abstract.p: Systems, methods, and apparatus for enhancing and utilizing owed-value accounts are provided, including, in accordance with some embodiments, automatically utilizing the remaining balance of an owed-value account to purchase a product or service on behalf of the owner of the owed-value account.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEMS, METHODS, AND APPARATUS FOR ENHANCING AND UTILIZING OWED-VALUE ACCOUNTS

abstract.p: Systems, methods, and apparatus for enhancing and utilizing owed-value accounts are provided.
